Introduction

Kong XiaoYin (simplified Chinese: 孔肖吟; Korean: 비이) is a Chinese idol singer. She is a graduated member of Chinese idol group SNH48 (Team SII), and its sub-unit 7SENSES under STAR48.

On October 14, 2020, Kong XiaoYin graduated from SNH48 (Team SII) but announced she'd continue her activities with SEN7ES.

On March 25, 2021, Kong XiaoYin announced on her official Weibo account that she will quit SEN7ES after rumours of a love scandal.

Team History:
[2012.10.14] - Joined SNH48 as a Research Student.
[2013.04.17] - Promoted to Team Unknown.
[2013.11.11] - Transferred to SNH48 Team SII (Team SII formation)
[2017.04.07] - Joined SNH48 sub-unit 7SENSES.
[2020.10.08] - Promoted to SNH48 Group Honourary Graduate.
[2020.10.14] - Graduated from SNH48 Team SII (Graduation Stage: October 3, 2020 | Graduation Ceremony: October 8, 2020).
[2021.03.25] - Quit 7SENSES

Election History:
1st Senbatsu Election - #15 (Senbatsu)
2nd Senbatsu Election - #16 (Senbatsu)
3rd Senbatsu Election - #25 (Undergirls)
4th Senbatsu Election - #12 (Top Girls)
5th Senbatsu Election - #13 (Top Girls)
6th Senbatsu Election - #6 (Top Girls)
7th Senbatsu Election - Didn't Participate
